title: Ship schema
description: A schema for ships used in STFC.

grade.title: The grade schema
grade.description: The grade of the ship with stars

ship_class.title: The ship_class schema
ship_class.description: The class instance of the ship

faction.title: The faction schema
faction.description: The faction where the ship belongs to.

img_url.title: The img_url schema
img_url.description: The URL of the ships image

ship_ability.title: The ship_ability schema
ship_ability.description: Instance for the ability of the ship.

blueprints.title: The blueprints schema
blueprints.description: Information about the blueprints for the ship.

quantity.title: The quantity schema
quantity.description: Number of blueprints needed to build the ship.

cost.title: The cost schema
cost.description: Cost of a single blueprint for the ship.

requirements.title: The requirements schema
requirements.description: List of all requirements needed before the ship can be build.

name.title: The name schema
name.description: The name of the required item.

level.title: The level schema
level.description: The level of the required item needed.

scrapable.title: The scrapable schema
scrapable.description: Boolean wether the ship can be scrapped or not.

required_scrapyard_level.title: The required_scrapyard_level schema
required_scrapyard_level.description: The scrapyard level needed to scrap the ship.

build_time.title: The build_time schema
build_time.description: The total build time for the current tier (in seconds)

repair_time.title: The repair_time schema
repair_time.description: The total repair time for the current tier (in seconds)

components.title: The components schema
components.description: List of all components of the current tier.

img_url.title: The img_url schema
img_url.description: An URL of the component image.

build_cost.title: The build_cost schema
build_cost.description: All cost needed to upgrade the component

resources.title: The resources schema
resources.description: All resources needed to upgrade the component.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: Single resource to upgrade the component.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The amount needed of the current resource.

materials.title: The materials schema
materials.description: All materials and others needed to upgrade the component.

anyOf.description: Single material or other to upgrade the component.
anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema

type.title: The type schema
type.description: The type of material or other needed.

grade.title: The grade schema
grade.description: (Optional) The grade in stars of the material.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The value needed of the current material or other.

repair_cost.title: The repair_cost schema
repair_cost.description: List of all costs involved in repairing the ship.

type.title: The type schema
type.description: Type of resource or other needed to repair the ship.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The value needed of the current resource or other.

additional_info.title: The additional_info schema
additional_info.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

name.title: The name schema
name.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

levels.title: The levels schema
levels.description: All XP levels of the current tier.

anyOf.description: Single level of the current tier.
anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema

ship_xp.title: The ship_xp schema
ship_xp.description: Ship XP needed to upgrade the ship to this level.

ability_bonus.title: The ability_bonus schema
ability_bonus.description: Current ability bonus with this level.

scrap_details.title: The scrap_details schema
scrap_details.description: Scrapping details for when the ship is scrapped at this level.

scrap_time.title: The scrap_time schema
scrap_time.description: The total time needed to scrap the ship (in seconds)

rewards.title: The rewards schema
rewards.description: List of all rewards when scrapping the ship at this level.

type.title: The type schema
type.description: Type of resource, material or other of the reward.

value.title: The value schema
value.description: The amount of this reward that will be given when scrapped.
